DOC.brief_summary: The study investigates whether eicosapentaenoic/docosahexaenoic acid supplementation affects behavior and cognition in children with attention deficit hyperactivity disorder.
DOC.brief_title: Effect of Long Chain Polyunsaturated Fatty Acids on Behavior and Cognition in Children With Attention Deficit Hyperactivity Disorder
DOC.criteria: ADHD diagnosis Age 912y Native German speaker Allergy against fish and fish products IQ below 85 Objections against pork gelatine
